description: This file defines a React context and provider for managing game statistics related to a Tic-Tac-Toe game. It includes functions for recording wins, draws, resetting statistics, and persists data using async storage.

classes.name: React.FC<React.PropsWithChildren>
classes.description: React functional component type used for the StatsProvider component.

methods.name: recordWin
methods.description: Records a win for player 'X' or 'O', updating statistics accordingly.

methods.name: recordDraw
methods.description: Records a draw, updating statistics accordingly.

methods.name: useStats
methods.description: Custom hook to access the statistics context.
